## ReactNativeContainer.configure() method

Configure this container with connection information.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
configure(options: ConfigureOptions): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | <code>ConfigureOptions</code> | Skygear connection information |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<void>`
